TEXT.S: = Langas = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Jweysweysyang ka alang Langas. 136 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 342 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 89% niqan 304 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 11% niqan 38 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 68%, Bunun 18%, Paiwan 1%, Truku 1%, ni rahuq na o 1%.
